# John Doe – Health Maintenance Care Plan (Age 30, Male)

**EHR Summary**
- No chronic diagnoses
- No current medications
- Labs: HbA1c 5.2% (normal)
- Allergy: Penicillin

**Guideline‑Based Screening & Labs**

| Blood Pressure | Measure at each visit; current 118/72 mmHg – continue routine checks | Ongoing |

| Colorectal Cancer | Not indicated until age 45 | — |

| Immunizations | Update Tdap if >10 yr, influenza annually, COVID‑19 booster as per CDC | As applicable |

**Lifestyle Goals**
- **Physical Activity:** ≥150 min moderate‑intensity aerobic activity per week + strength training 2×/week.
- **Diet:** Mediterranean‑style diet; <30 % calories from saturated fat; ≥5 servings fruits/vegetables daily.
- **Weight:** Maintain BMI 18.5‑24.9 (current BMI 23.4).
- **Substance Use:** No tobacco; limit alcohol ≤2 drinks/day.
- **Sleep:** 7‑9 hours/night.

**Risk Assessment**
- ASCVD 10‑year risk: **2.1 % (Low)**
  - Recommendation: Emphasize lifestyle; no pharmacotherapy needed at this time.

**Medication Considerations**
- No new meds required.
- No drug‑interaction alerts (patient not on any meds).

**Follow‑Up**
- **Next appointment:** Primary‑care visit in 12 months to reassess labs, vitals, and lifestyle adherence.
- **Interim labs:** Lipid panel repeat in 3 years if normal; otherwise sooner per clinician judgment.
